pdp-desc: Dynamic departmental permission management system for use on Pega.
pdp-permissions-intro:
'''Groups'''
Grant permissions for this space to all the members of a group.
pdp-invalid-page-description: The page you have requested is not valid. Please click on a page in the navigation menu above to return.
pdp-internal-exception-intro: An unhandled exception was thrown and the application could not continue.
pdp-missing-permissions-description: You do not have permission to edit this space. If you believe this is a mistake, please contact an administrator of this wiki.
pdp-debug-information-intro: The debug information below may be of interest to the administrator / help desk:
pdp-how-to-get-help-intro: This error is likely due to some unexpected behaviour or to a misconfiguration of PegaDepartmentalPermissions. Contact an administrator of this wiki, and send them the error message above.
pdp-add-space-intro: You will be the Space Administrator for this new space. Once the space is created, you can edit its details, create content and set up permissions.
pdp-add-space-form-namespace-help: Namespace must be unique. Once saved, it cannot be changed.
pdp-invalid-input: Something went wrong while processing your input
pdp-permissions-core-namespace: Notice: You are changing the permissions of a MediaWiki core namespace. A core namespace cannot be renamed or archived and does not have an owner.
pdp-cannot-remove-self: You cannot remove yourself as an administrator of this space
